languages.text: "Утверждение истинное. Но кто, по-твоему, был ее учителями? Адептус Механикус. Всякое познание исходит от нас".
"This statement is true. But who do you suppose were her teachers? The Adeptus Mechanicus. All knowledge flows from us."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение истинное. Но кто, по-твоему, был ее учителями? Адептус Механикус. Всякое познание исходит от нас".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. But who do you suppose were her teachers? The Adeptus Mechanicus. All knowledge flows from us."
"This statement is true. But who do you suppose were her teachers? The Adeptus Mechanicus. All knowledge flows from us."
"This statement is true. But who do you suppose were her teachers? The Adeptus Mechanicus. All knowledge flows from us."
"This statement is true. But who do you suppose were her teachers? The Adeptus Mechanicus. All knowledge flows from us."

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的，但你觉得她的老师会是谁？正是机械修会。所有的知识都源于我们。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. But who do you suppose were her teachers? The Adeptus Mechanicus. All knowledge flows from us."

traits.locale_text: “这话确实没错，但你觉得她的老师会是谁？正是机械修会。所有的知识都源于我们。”

languages.text: «Esta declaración es correcta. Pero ¿quién cree que fueron sus mentores? El Adeptus Mechanicus. Todo conocimiento viene de nosotros».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. But who do you suppose were her teachers? The Adeptus Mechanicus. All knowledge flows from us."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es correcta. Pero ¿quién cree que fueron sus mentores? El Adeptus Mechanicus. Todo conocimiento viene de nosotros».

languages.text: 「この主張は真実であろう。ですが、教えたのは誰だと思いますか？帝国技術局です。すべての知識は我らが与えるものなのだ」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. But who do you suppose were her teachers? The Adeptus Mechanicus. All knowledge flows from us."

traits.locale_text: 「この主張は真実であろう。ですが、教えたのは誰だと思いますか？帝国技術局です。すべての知識は我らが与えるものなのだ」

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Aber woher hat sie wohl dieses Wissen? Vom Adeptus Mechanicus. Alles Wissen kommt von uns."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. But who do you suppose were her teachers? The Adeptus Mechanicus. All knowledge flows from us."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Aber woher hat sie wohl dieses Wissen? Vom Adeptus Mechanicus. Alles Wissen kommt von uns."

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte, mais de qui tient-elle ces enseignements, à votre avis ? De l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Nous sommes la source de toute connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. But who do you suppose were her teachers? The Adeptus Mechanicus. All knowledge flows from us."

traits.locale_text: « Vous dites vrai, mais de qui tient-elle ces enseignements, à votre avis ? De l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Nous sommes la source de toute connaissance. »

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru lakin bunları kimden öğrenmiştir? Adeptus Mechanicus'tan tabii ki. Tüm irfanın kaynağı biziz."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. But who do you suppose were her teachers? The Adeptus Mechanicus. All knowledge flows from us."

traits.locale_text: "Bu ifade doğru. Lakin sence bunları kimden öğrendi? Adeptus Mechanicus'tan tabii. Tüm irfanın kaynağı biziz."
